description:
This is for Pokemon Mystery Dungeon Explorers of Sky, a game where you inhabit a pokemon and explore
through dungeons, solve quests, and help out other Pokemon in the colony
game: Pokemon Mystery Dungeon Explorers of Sky

v0.1.0.description:
All checks and receives should be working. 
Currently all dungeons will complete before the boss. This might mean you never fight dialga, but beating temporal tower up to dialga is victory? We will see
v0.1.0.title: v0.1.0

v0.1.1.description:
Things that hopefully have been added/fixed since last release:
Dungeons should only release their checks when you finish the boss
You should be able to beat dialga to finish the game
There are a bunch of options added that can be used
You can actually get a bag now
Some other functionality/debug stuff
v0.1.1.title: v0.1.1

v0.1.2.description:
In this version we have added:
Traps
Darkrai victory condition (and fixed Dialga hopefully?)
Dojo Dungeons
Shop Items
Fixed Special Episode Functionality
Fixed a bunch of softlocks/ progression issues

Known Bug:
The Starting dojo dungeon amount only sends max 2 dojos to the game even if they show up in the spoiler log. This also means that if you try to generate more, they will not be in your checks list so they will NEVER be opened beyond the second one (if you did max for example)
v0.1.2.title: v0.1.2

v0.1.3.description:
Update! Added in logic to make sure early game is early game and you don't have to do a bunch of late game dungeons right at the beginning

In this release
Shop Items are fixed and work now
Fixed Dojo dungeons and many items getting sent at the same time
Added in filler items that are lootboxes that you can open at Xatu's

Lootbox Types:

Heavy Box: Throwable Items
Shiny Box: TMs
Nifty Box: Equipable Items
Dainty Box: Gummies
Glittery Box: Consumables
Prety Box: Evolution Items
Deluxe Box: Rare Items (possibly too strong atm)
Light Box: Tickets
Cute Box: Aura Bows
Hard Box: Ancient Items
Sinister Box: Negative Status Items
v0.1.3.title: v0.1.3

v0.2.0.description:
Giant update to this apworld. There is a lot added from the previous version.
In this version we have added:
Mission as Checks
More filler items and traps
Custom name effects for those who supported development
Deathlink!
Shop items display previews of what you will get
Starter settings (random, choose, do the quiz and override, vanilla)
Added typesanity which allows you to have the same type for your MC and partner
Added Secret rank as a logic gate for some special items
Added legendaries to the item pool (will only be sent after Dialga)
Added instruments that are macguffins for the Darkrai goal with their own unique effects
Added IQ scaling
Added Manaphy quest as checks
Your name will autofill from the slot name in your yaml. It can be changed
Fixed MANY MANY bugs
v0.2.0.title: v0.2.0

v0.2.0Post3.description: Fixed Dark Crater not getting sent on darkrai goal
v0.2.0Post3.title: v0.2.0 post3

v0.2.1.description: Fixes [all documented issues](https://github.com/CrypticMonkey33/ArchipelagoExplorersOfSky/issues?q=is%3Aclosed+milestone%3A0.2.1) from 0.2.0. Including the ones that we failed to properly fix in 0.2.1rc1!
v0.2.1.title: v0.2.1

v0.2.1rc1.description: Fixed [all documented bugs](https://github.com/CrypticMonkey33/ArchipelagoExplorersOfSky/issues?q=is%3Aclosed+milestone%3A0.2.1) from 0.2.0. Some fixes are untested, so this is a release candidate!
v0.2.1rc1.title: v0.2.1rc1

v0.2.2.description:
Much smaller than 0.2.1; this is just a couple small fixes.
* Actually fixed the logic for Hidden Land missions so it'll match what's in the client; I tried and failed to fix this for 0.2.1.
* Made legendary rematches accessible (some weren't).
* Added a failsafe for Dark Crater, similar to what Hidden Land has.
* Fixed a single instance of bad text formatting (`[CN]Your ability to go to [CS:P]Shimmer Desert[CR]\nremains unchanged![W:60]...but you did get a check!`)
v0.2.2.title: v0.2.2

v0.2.3.description: Fixed Concealed Ruins to have the correct id. This will unfortunately not help with worlds already created, but will fix any worlds created off this base
v0.2.3.title: v0.2.3

v0.3.0.description:
### **We did it, we're finally here!**

### For those coming from the Release Candidates here is what changed from rc12 to now:

Aegis Cave has been fixed to work correctly (again)
Fixed a small HL to TT Crash
Changed some yaml wording slightly for clarity
Instruments now get added to the count before you pick them up from pelipper
Updated the options.json for the poptracker to be able to see all options
Max rank now keeps all ranks in the apworld, just makes any not required into excluded locations
Created an FAQ!!!

### All Others:

### New features:
Cutscene skip - ability to skip cutscenes by pressing Select during the cutscene

In-game Progress Tracker - You can now see available checks and completed checks in game!

Diglett - You can now generate missions for a specific dungeon from Diglett in the guild!

Ranksanity - all ranks can be checks, configurable in the yaml

Special Episode Sanity - Start the game in a special episode, unlock the main game through an item (yaml option)
Exclude Special Episodes - completely remove SEs from the apworld.
Also smaller SEs have more available checks

XP Scaling - You can now scale how much XP you get

Hint system - When there would normally be a dimensional scream, now you get a multiworld hint! (and a new NPC for hints)

New Traps - There are now traps that can influence you while you are in a dungeon.
Also there are some "new dungeons."
Traps are completely configurable in the yaml now.

Filler Items - added more filler items and took some out of loot boxes

Guest Pokemon Level Scaling - You can now scale your guest pokemon to your level!

Sky Peak - configurable Sky peak to change how Sky Peak works

Added some long location items and a yaml option to include them

Spinda's Cafe now has some checks! Both for recycles and for drinks/drink events

Duskull's bank now has checks for different money amounts

Pelipper - That pesky Pelipper now can change how he operates to be less invasive

Exclusive Items - Now Exclusive items are true to their name and only 1 of each can be added to the apworld

Shorter dungeons can now have missions earlier in the dungeon

Bronzong - there is now a way to warp between all your favorite parts of town!


### **||Bug fixes||**

Client should no longer get spammed with hints if you have already gotten the item that is hinteed

Dungeon only yamls (missions set to 0) should now actually generate correctly

If the goal is Dialga, late game dungeons will no longer be added to the  apworld

5th bag upgrade should correctly give 48 bag spaces

Pelipper no longer gives duplicate items and should no longer softlock when storage is full

Fixed the client so it still tracks correctly even when you connect too early
v0.3.0.title: v0.3.0

v0.3.0rc10.description:
difference from rc9:
Woops hintables changed and Monkey forgot to change AP side

differences from rc8:
Fixed Special Episode Sanity to not automatically unlock main game right away
Fixed a generation issue if the player has a starting filler item
Rom: added some text strings, fixed some tracking issues, added some QoL indicators in the guild for bottle/cafe missions
v0.3.0rc10.title: v0.3.0rc10

v0.3.0rc12.description:
One of these days we will have a functioning rc

difference from rc10:
Made a small change to the hint location during generation that should fix a potential problem occuring in large multiworlds. Shouldn't be a problem for smaller multiworlds

differences from rc11:
Actually fixed the hint location generation so it generates the correct amount (20) of hints as opposed to 14.
Miracle Sea behavior fixed to be correct in rom
v0.3.0rc12.title: v0.3.0rc12

v0.3.0rc5.description:
Difference from rc1
Fixed filler items causing a generation issue
Fixed hints being 1 byte of when written to hintables.bin

Difference from rc3
Fixed Apple hint causing the client to crash
~~Known Issue for this RC: if you have recruits off pokemon (including diglett) will not show up in the guild on the mission level~~ fixed in rc5

Difference from rc4
Fixed the randomly reverted changes to the rom
Fixed the -1000 poke issue where it would add 1000 weight of 0 poke into the pool instead of 10 weight of -1000 poke
Added Golden Mask item
Made Duskull 20k essential
Clarity added to the Options

New Features:
Cutscene skip - ability to skip cutscenes by pressing a button during the cutscene

In-game progress tracker - Ability to see available checks and completed checks in game

Ranksanity - each rank can be a check, max rank configurable in the yaml

Special Episode Sanity - Start the game in a special episode, need to unlock main game (yaml option)
Also added the ability to exclude special episodes completely
Some of the smaller SEs now have more checks

XP Scaling - Added the ability to scale the amount of XP you gain (Yaml option)

Dimensional Scream Hints - Partially implemented in game hints via dimensional screams and certain NPCs

New traps - In dungeon traps that can influence you while walking through a dungeon.
Also some new lookalike dungeons
Traps are also now configurable in the yaml so you can enable/disable traps as well as how often you want to get trapped
Pulled some of the filler items out of item boxes to make them more common and not make you pay money for them

Guest Pokemon Level Scaling - Ablity to change how Level Scaling works and how it affects Guest pokemon

Sky Peak - Sky peak split into multiple items, with the ability to change how sky peak opens

Added Final Maze into the item pool as a long location, as well as made some longer checks (Rule Dungeons) into the long location yaml option

Diglett - Diglett can now fill the mission boards with missions and outlaws for a particular dungeon

Spinda - Spinda Cafe now has checks for creating drinks and getting drink events

Pelipper - Pelipper now has the ability to change how he operates to be less invasive

Aegis Cave - Unfortunately Aegis Cave actually exists in logic now

Macguffins - Macguffins yaml options have slightly changed so that it is now required/total instead of required/additional. Also the max macguffins has been reduced due to storing them in rom

Exclusive Items - Exclusive items are now EXCLUSIVE so only one will show up in the game and only if they can actually help (the legendary is in game)

Short dungeons now have more missions possible

There is now a Bronzong warp pad in places around town

Added checks for Duskull bank amounts and Lottery winning (some of which are put into long locations)

Bug Fixes (Some might be both introduced and fixed in our working on 0.3)
Completing Dusk Forest a second time no longer shows Beach Cave cutscene before completion

Client should no longer get spammed with hints

Dungeon only yamls (having missions set to 0) should now work correctly.

If the goal is dialga, late game dungeons will no longer be added to the game (Might add an option for this later on)

Fixed a black screen crash on Team Name/Bag Upgrade 1 checks

Miracle sea now correctly goes into open mode after completion

Pelipper should no longer softlock when storage is full

Pelipper should no be giving duplicate items anymore

Wobbuffett stick trades should now work correctly, not be some other item

The 5th Bag Upgrade should actually give the correct 48 bag spaces
v0.3.0rc5.title: v0.3.0rc5

v0.3.0rc7.description:
differences from rc6:
no longer get to yell at lappy every time subx updates
Multiworlds with more than one game should no longer cause issues with hints

differences from rc5:
added a byte to rom for sky peaks for progressive to work correctly
fixed the client loop so you can now connect whenever and it should be fine
Added some fun death messages to deathlink
Fixed the client spamming already found hints
updated location logic to make SE sanity not as brutal
updated logging for RFS to hopefully finally figure out what is going on
made sure unit tests work correctly
In game tracker fixes
added addition to the credits to give credit to those who helped make this mod
Fixed a version detection error
Fixed softlocks from using bronzong to teleport
Deep Dusk Forest should no longer loop on itself
(I think I got them? Hard to tell with the CoT commit names...)
v0.3.0rc7.title: v0.3.0rc7

v0.3.0rc8.description:
differences from rc7
A couple small logic changes
romside: Add more dialogue, fix game hint bug, fix many other bugs, fixed legendary recruitment checks
v0.3.0rc8.title: v0.3.0rc8

v0.3.1.description:
New Feature:
The Client now tells you what version the client and the server are running, so there isn't any more confusion on if there is a server/client difference!

Bug Fixes from 0.3.0:

- Accepting Seven Instruments Missions should function correctly (also small logic change)
- Hint Job Requests should no longer appear on the Outlaw Notice Board
- Players should no longer be able to request missions from lookalike dungeons from Diglett
- Dark Crater should now open correctly after getting the correct amount of instruments
- added an override to get_filler_item_name so that when someone adds items to start_inventory_from_pool it no longer accidentally duplicates progression items
- Text on mission board should no longer overflow into other missions

Possible Known Issues:
100k Duskull Bank check might get sent early
Cutscene after Regirock might cause the game to crash if pelipper is trying to send you items




Added a small update to the client.py for accounting for some "special" characters (e.g. é) If you want to include this, unzip the .apworld, replace the client.py, then rezip the apworld and make sure to give it the extension .apworld
v0.3.1.title: v0.3.1

v0.3.2.description:
Hopefully the final version of 0.3! Unless we find some horrible bug that can't afford to wait for the next major version, but _hopefully_ that won't happen. We're hoping to move onto proper development of 0.4, and get working on some new content.

As per usual, do keep in mind that different APWorld versions aren't designed to be compatible, so make sure the player uses the same version that was used to generate the game.

 Quite a few things have been fixed between 0.3.1 and now, so here's the list of (hopefully) fixed issues:
* Pelipper will no longer try to deliver items behind a FadeOutAll where textboxes are hidden. This is a specific type of fade that's only used in a few cutscenes, so this will only fix a rare "softlock" where the game gets stuck on a black screen (though you could just keep pressing A until you got through all the Pelipper text). (#173)
* The 100k Duskull Bank check won't send out early. (#174)
* Job requests that contain hints will no longer appear on the Outlaw board, as all of the hints are written as non-outlaw jobs. (#175)
* Seven Treasures missions will unlock their dungeon properly, and _shouldn't_ be missable. (#176 #177)
* A few typos were fixed. (#183 #198 #210)
* Some tracker text was corrected to clarify that rule dungeons are non-essential *only* when long locations are off. (#185)
* **Talking to the partner will no longer cause random crashes in the same room!** The script was super big, causing it to overflow and overwrite data for other scripts in the room. We've split it into multiple separate scripts, so no more overflows! (#186 #221) We hope that this should fix a couple of other bugs that we weren't able to otherwise reproduce:
  * ~~The "Sure To Win" diary entry should no longer crash in Bidoof's Wish.~~ **Edit**: This is still happening. Avoid reading diary entries in special episodes (opening the diary itself to claim a check is fine.) (#209)
  * The Regigigas Chamber in Aegis Cave should now function properly. (#227)
* Clearing the Fighting/Psychic Dojo in Today's "Oh My Gosh" should no longer unlock all other dojos. (#187)
* The Ludicolo Dance check should send out properly. (#188)
* Wobbuffet will no longer duplicate items when stacking them in your bag. (#189)
* The tracker should now consistently show info for the correct dungeon ID. (#191)
* Star Cave is now treated as an early dungeon by both the ROM and client; they were desynced before, potentially making some checks inaccessible. (#193)
* Having a tilde or square bracket in a slot name will no longer cause connecting to fail; we now store the proper slot name and the "EoS-friendly" slot name separately, with the former being used for connecting. (#194)
* Sending mission checks for rule dungeons or a few miscellaneous dungeons (such as Temporal Tower) will no longer softlock the game. (#195)
* Removed a few hardcoded dungeon unlocks; namely, the Star Cave unlock from Jirachi's challenge letter and the Labyrinth Cave unlock from the Gabite Scale mission. (#196 #199)
* The Touch Grass trap will no longer use the beach bubbles scene; this seems to *really* like crashing, and we still don't know why. Hopefully we can bring it back in the future, but for now we've just forced it to reroll when it rolls the beach scene. (#197)
* Having too high of a guild rank will no longer cause Aegis Cave boss fights to be skipped, making their checks inaccessible. (#200)
* The Drowzee crossroads hint now displays properly. (#201)
* The Recycle Shop Dungeon 5 check will now send properly. (#202)
* Torkoal's hints are now in the right order; the hint names match where they're actually found. (#203)
* Receiving Sentry Duty during certain cutscenes will no longer break cutscene flow, potentially causing loss of progress. (#205)
* The Team Name Location check now logically requires the Main Game Unlock item. (#211)
* The Sneasel's Gratitude check will now send out properly. (#214)
* **The instrument/RFS count will _finally_ stay in sync,** thanks to backend rewrites! (#215)
* Fixed a rare scenario where the font would be completely messed up after the credits, resulting in some very funny Dialga text. (Technically we just force-reset the font after the credits, but if it works it works.) (#217)
* ~~**The top screen tracker should no longer cause crashes!!**~~ This one has been a thorn in our side for a *while*. For the uninformed, leaving the tracker open for too long could cause lag, and eventually memory overflows that would crash the game and send out a ton of checks and goal. This should no longer happen, everyone say thank you Hecka! **Edit**: This can still happen, but it's MUCH more rare. Just don't use the tracker on any page with the spinning animation (Hidden Land, Temporal Tower, Dark Crater) and you'll be fine. (https://github.com/Chesyon/eos-archipelago-patches/issues/17 #218)
* The Denched Bluff lookalike dungeon will now work properly even after clearing Beach Cave, instead of sending you to the Beach Cave bossfight for some reason. (#220)
* Missions in The Nightmare now logically require Mt. Bristle. (#225)
* ~~'Fixed' a weird issue where team members would have their stats revert back to an old state, resulting in loss of progress. Not sure how this happened, but Lappy now manually saves the stats, so hopefully that fixes it.~~ **Edit:** Seems like this is still happening rarely. We have theories but no confirmation yet. Please let us know if you encounter this. (#226 #234)
* Losing in the Deep Star Cave bossfight will now still send out the check, as it shouldn't matter whether or not you lose this fight. (#228)
* Hints should no longer display wonkily when using characters not in the game's font; they're properly converted to Windows 1252 instead of staying in UTF-8. Also added an edge cases where we use special characters from the game's font when available (currently just the ★ character; we'll probably add more in the future.) (#229)
* The way missions are handled by the client has gone under major improvements, and should no longer be able to permanently skip mission checks. (#232)
* ~~Manaphy should no longer randomly show up in the guild on a Dialga goal.~~ **Edit:** May still be happening rarely. Please let us know if you encounter this. (#233)
* The way legendaries are sent by the client has gone under major improvements, so legendaries should no longer be duplicated. We hope. (#236)
* Oh, and we have a manifest now, so things should work on Archipelago 0.7. Yay.

_Hoo_, that was a lot. That took what, 45 minutes to write? Yeah. Anyways, there are a bunch of issues where we just have to try to make fixes and then wait to see if anyone reports the issue still happening in a release candidate. As such, it's always possible that a fix _doesn't_ work and we just didn't know about it. If you find that **any** of the bugs above are still present in this version, please go to their issue page and leave a comment letting us know!
Thanks for playing!
v0.3.2.title: v0.3.2

v0.3.2rc1.description:
Fixes many bugs present in 0.3.1. Many fixes are untested, so **this is a prerelease!** All fixes listed below contain links to their respective issues. If you test a fix, and that fix's issue is still open and has the 'preview' tag, leave a comment and let us know that the fix is working! Alternatively, if a fix _isn't_ working, let us know that too.
Fixes:
* [The 100k bank check will no longer send at roughly 65k gold.](https://github.com/CrypticMonkey33/ArchipelagoExplorersOfSky/issues/174)
* [Checks related to Seven Treasures missions should now send properly.](https://github.com/CrypticMonkey33/ArchipelagoExplorersOfSky/issues/177)
* [There is no longer a missing space in the job title `Swindling [pokemon] ran away!`](https://github.com/CrypticMonkey33/ArchipelagoExplorersOfSky/issues/183)
* [Some tracker text has been clarified to state that rule dungeons are non-essential _only_ with long locations off.](https://github.com/CrypticMonkey33/ArchipelagoExplorersOfSky/issues/185)
* [The variable check code was optimized such that talking to the partner followed by triggering another script in the same room such as Bronzong or Chimecho will no longer crash the game.](https://github.com/CrypticMonkey33/ArchipelagoExplorersOfSky/issues/186)
* [Completing a dojo dungeon in a special episode will no longer unlock all dojo dungeons.](https://github.com/CrypticMonkey33/ArchipelagoExplorersOfSky/issues/187)
* [The Ludicolo Dance check will now send properly.](https://github.com/CrypticMonkey33/ArchipelagoExplorersOfSky/issues/188)
* [Wobbuffet will no longer duplicate items by sending them to storage when stacking in the bag.](https://github.com/CrypticMonkey33/ArchipelagoExplorersOfSky/issues/189)
* [The in-game tracker will no longer mark certain special episode dungeons as completed early.](https://github.com/CrypticMonkey33/ArchipelagoExplorersOfSky/issues/191)
* [The ROM now properly treats Star Cave as a late game dungeon, matching the client's behavior.](https://github.com/CrypticMonkey33/ArchipelagoExplorersOfSky/issues/193)
* [Slot names with tildes or square brackets will no longer fail to connect.](https://github.com/CrypticMonkey33/ArchipelagoExplorersOfSky/issues/194)
* [Sending mission checks for Hidden Land (Dialga goal only), Temporal Tower (Dialga goal only), Dark Crater, Aegis Cave, Oblivion Forest, Treacherous Waters, Southeastern Island, Inferno Cave, and all level-reset dungeons will no longer cause the game to softlock.](https://github.com/CrypticMonkey33/ArchipelagoExplorersOfSky/issues/195)
* [Jirachi's challenge letter will no longer open Star Cave automatically.](https://github.com/CrypticMonkey33/ArchipelagoExplorersOfSky/issues/196)
* [The Gabite Scale mission will no longer open Labyrinth Cave automatically.](https://github.com/CrypticMonkey33/ArchipelagoExplorersOfSky/issues/199)
* [Having a guild rank that is too high will no longer skip Aegis Cave boss fights.](https://github.com/CrypticMonkey33/ArchipelagoExplorersOfSky/issues/200)
* [Hint text from Drowzee at the crossroads now displays properly.](https://github.com/CrypticMonkey33/ArchipelagoExplorersOfSky/issues/201)
* [Torkoal will now properly allow you to view the THIEF!! hint.](https://github.com/CrypticMonkey33/ArchipelagoExplorersOfSky/issues/203)
* [Receiving Sentry Duty will no longer block the cutscene at the end of Treeshroud Forest from playing.](https://github.com/CrypticMonkey33/ArchipelagoExplorersOfSky/issues/205)
* [The `Poké x-1000` is no longer missing the accented é.](https://github.com/CrypticMonkey33/ArchipelagoExplorersOfSky/issues/210)
* [The Team Name Location check is no longer in logic until the main game is unlocked.](https://github.com/CrypticMonkey33/ArchipelagoExplorersOfSky/issues/211)

Note that not all reported bugs have been fixed just yet! See [here](https://github.com/CrypticMonkey33/ArchipelagoExplorersOfSky/issues?q=is%3Aopen%20milestone%3A%220.3.2%22%20-label%3Apreview) for a list of known, unfixed bugs.
v0.3.2rc1.title: v0.3.2rc1

v0.3.2rc2.description:
rc2:
Fixed 2 major bugs present in rc1 - 
Fixed an issue where random starter would cause Shaymin to be your partner and then crash the game
Fixed an issue where SE Sanity would cause a generation failure due to Team Name Location

rc1:
Fixes many bugs present in 0.3.1. Many fixes are untested, so this is a prerelease! All fixes listed below contain links to their respective issues. If you test a fix, and that fix's issue is still open and has the 'preview' tag, leave a comment and let us know that the fix is working! Alternatively, if a fix isn't working, let us know that too.

* [The in-game tracker will no longer mark certain special episode dungeons as completed early.](https://github.com/CrypticMonkey33/ArchipelagoExplorersOfSky/issues/191)
* [The ROM now properly treats Star Cave as a late game dungeon, matching the client's behavior.](https://github.com/CrypticMonkey33/ArchipelagoExplorersOfSky/issues/193)
* [Slot names with tildes or square brackets will no longer fail to connect.](https://github.com/CrypticMonkey33/ArchipelagoExplorersOfSky/issues/194)
* [Sending mission checks for Hidden Land (Dialga goal only), Temporal Tower (Dialga goal only), Dark Crater, Aegis Cave, Oblivion Forest, Treacherous Waters, Southeastern Island, Inferno Cave, and all level-reset dungeons will no longer cause the game to softlock.](https://github.com/CrypticMonkey33/ArchipelagoExplorersOfSky/issues/195)
* [Jirachi's challenge letter will no longer open Star Cave automatically.](https://github.com/CrypticMonkey33/ArchipelagoExplorersOfSky/issues/196)

* [Having a guild rank that is too high will no longer skip Aegis Cave boss fights.](https://github.com/CrypticMonkey33/ArchipelagoExplorersOfSky/issues/200)
* [Hint text from Drowzee at the crossroads now displays properly.](https://github.com/CrypticMonkey33/ArchipelagoExplorersOfSky/issues/201)
* [Torkoal will now properly allow you to view the THIEF!! hint.](https://github.com/CrypticMonkey33/ArchipelagoExplorersOfSky/issues/203)
* [Receiving Sentry Duty will no longer block the cutscene at the end of Treeshroud Forest from playing.](https://github.com/CrypticMonkey33/ArchipelagoExplorersOfSky/issues/205)
* [The `Poké x-1000` is no longer missing the accented é.](https://github.com/CrypticMonkey33/ArchipelagoExplorersOfSky/issues/210)
* [The Team Name Location check is no longer in logic until the main game is unlocked.](https://github.com/CrypticMonkey33/ArchipelagoExplorersOfSky/issues/211)

Note that not all reported bugs have been fixed just yet! See [here](https://github.com/CrypticMonkey33/ArchipelagoExplorersOfSky/issues?q=is%3Aopen%20milestone%3A%220.3.2%22%20-label%3Apreview) for a list of known, unfixed bugs.
v0.3.2rc2.title: v0.3.2rc2

v0.3.2rc3.description:
Corrected a few issues with mismatching text or dungeon types (star cave -> early, late outlaws are outlaws)

Fixed some logic issues with long location checks since they are always in the game

Changed the way the ★ character is written to hint text so it should now show up correctly

Finally figured out how to fix the instrument and relic fragment shard counts so they stop getting disconnected from what AP has

Fixed mission and outlaw rewards to not occasionally skip over rewards

Sneasel's Gratitude should now properly give the check

Sentry Duty should no longer cause issues with pulling you out of cutscenes and skipping end of dungeon checks

Torkoal's hints should now be the correct hint

Aegis Cave should no longer skip chamber fights

Potentially other fixes missed

Issues addressed (to be closed if no issues arise):
#232 #229 #225 #215 #214 #211 #205 #203 #202 #200 #199 #196 #195 #193 #191 #189 #188 #187 #185 #183 #177 #174 #152 #133
